name: You have applied for a final order (JOINT) (Both Applied)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

You have applied for a final order, which is the court document that will legally end your ((isDivorce??marriage))((isDissolution??civil partnership)). Your ((partner)) has also applied.

You will receive an email confirming whether the final order has been granted within 2 working days.

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: You have applied for a final order
